sentences: Software Developer in Test, £475 per day, Inside IR35, 6 months, 2-3 days in office    Your new company  You will be working for a client of ours in the private sector for their end client, based in Edinburgh 2-3 days per week
Your new role  You will be working in the continuous improvement team, utilising desktop and web development applications
This includes both desktop and web development applications (C#, Azure, DevOps and Oracle databases)
A combination of manual and automation testing will be involved
You will be responsible in the design, development and maintenance of automated test frameworks and test suites for their end client
This requires writing and maintaining automated test scripts using different languages and testing tools
You will review both technical and business needs, specifications and technical design feedback to successfully develop the application
You will be working alongside developers to fix system issues, coordinating on product design and offering inputs on the testability functional elements and product designs
This will involve designing, developing and executing automation scripts using open-source tools
Finally, working with cross-functional teams, you will identify, record and track bugs alongside thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved
What you'll need to succeed  2 years experience working in Agile development practices, at least 1 year of experience using Gherkin/BDD and 2 years in Static Testing techniques
Furthermore, an understanding of automated testing principles is required, with experience in:
API Testing in
NET environment (C# in VS)
or API Testing using Postman (scripting tests in JavaScript)
or UI Testing in a
NET environment (C#, Selenium in VS)
It is a requirement that you are able to attend in office 2-3 days per week
What you'll get in return  This role is paying up to £475 per day (Inside IR35) on an initial 6 month contract, with scope for extension
